--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Valued Partners,

As the holiday season approaches, it brings opportunities for social gatherings and indulgent meals. While this time of year is meant for celebration, we understand that maintaining a balance between festive pleasures and healthy habits can be challenging. 

We are pleased to share this month's newsletter on Guilt-Free Guide to Holiday Festivities, designed to help you navigate the season with both enjoyment and well-being.

Happy reading.

Warm Regards, 


 <https://nascoconnect.com/resources/images/memberPortal/Icon_Colored_Logo.png> 

Nasco Middle East
P.O. Box 62528, Dubai, UAE
T +971 4 351 4292  F +971 4 351 4291
